contest-event.event-date:
April 26, 1959 D Blackpool Contest (A Section)
Blackpool Contest (A Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Blackpool Contest blackpool-contest-a-section
Tower Circus, Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK Best cornet - Lindley. Best soprano - Elland. Best Trombone Rolls Royce. Best euphonium - Hade Edge. Best basses - Haigh. 8th annual contest. 11 bands competed.
May 1, 2014, 9:14 a.m. April 10, 2017, 8:31 a.m.
1 Lindley Band Peter Wadsworth
2 Hade Edge Harold Swallow
3 Haigh Prize Harry Bentham
4 Dinnington Colliery Band Joe Armstrong
Unknown Result Elland Silver Band Unknown
Unknown Result Rolls Royce(Barnoldswick) Unknown
